There is a JUnit related site on http://junit.netbeans.org,
you can find there useful info about Netbeans JUnit module.

For the servlets testing see the online web site which has all
the information for using J2EEUnit and understanding how
it works : http://j2eeunit.sourceforge.net.

Vita
